definition: to put sb on an intravenous drip
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person

sentences.english: Fluids intravenously when my dad went out the next day to buy nourishment, mother home with me.
sentences.chinese: 第二天打吊針時爸爸出去買營養品，媽媽在家陪我。
